Firestone.NAME: Firestone
DESCRIPTION: Deal #b{Pot} damage at the start of your turn.

Protectio.NAME: Protectio
DESCRIPTION: Gain #b{Pot} Block at the start of your turn.

Incendium.NAME: Incendium
DESCRIPTION: Deal #b{Pot} damage to all enemies at the start of your turn.

Reservo.NAME: Reservo
DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn #yRetain up to #b1 card.
At the end of the turn #yRetain up to #b2 card.

Prismatic.NAME: Prismatic
DESCRIPTION: Give a random class card each turn.
give a random upgraded class card each turn.

Industria.NAME: Industria
DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 energy at the start of your turn.
